Game: Cho Aniki- Otoko no Tamafuda 2000-02-10T00:00:00-08:00 Cho Aniki: Otoko no Tamafuda (超兄貴 男の魂札 Chō Aniki: Otoko no Tamafuda?, lit. "Super Big Brother: Spirit Man Tag") is a video game in the Cho Aniki series. This twist on the Cho Aniki universe pits the heroes of the previous games on a role-playing video game quest in which battles are fought with playing cards. According to an article on the game at the Hardcore Gaming 101 website, the title of the game is a pun. The title translates to "Man's Tamafuda," with tamafuda being a portmanteau of tamashii — Japanese for "soul" — and hanafuda — a Japanese card game. It is also likely that the pun extends to another meaning of tama, "balls". The game was released for the portable Wonderswan system in 2000. 1 <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/b4facb6f-a84c-4ae4-86d2-999984a2062f.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/e3890b4d-85e3-4c5e-98cb-4f9e40409755.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/29a0aad3-99d4-4bb4-bbb8-908dc248fc95.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/936d5425-32bf-4380-8520-b69e817c3c4f.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/034a2073-554f-4c1e-b419-5dc034bd3a93.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/c21c961a-6569-40ec-8907-fd5c875b44f2.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/e2313f48-60e0-4ab4-8e40-f8bf613f4af1.PNG 4 Role-Playing Masaya Bandai
